function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 and other infectious diseases through aerosols and contaminated surfaces in indoor spaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, resulting in potential outbreaks and public health crises.","Mitigation":"Implementing improved air quality measures and reducing contact surfaces in buildings.","Technologies":"HVAC systems with UVGI and Bipolar ionization, antimicrobial paint, antimicrobial copper alloy-coated touch surfaces, and UV filter glass.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and public health workers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."}]}
